attributes.action: Free IVF or IUI for homosexuals and women over 40
attributes.additional_details: I would like to fight for the government to agree for the NHS to give free IVf or IUI (whichever is more suitable to the individuals) for same sex couples and women over 40. Paying ridiculous amounts of money for a child is outrageous. Hetrosexuals do not have to pay for the right to have a child, so why should homosexuals and women who struggle to conceive?
